channel.title: On-Premises Deployment on Iguazio MLOps Platform Documentation

item.title: On-Premises Deployment Specifications
item.description: Overview This document lists the hardware specifications for on-premises ("on-prem") deployment of version 3.2.1 of the MLOps Platform ("the platform"). Capacity CalculationsAll capacity calculations in the hardware specifications are performed using the base-10 (decimal) number system. For example, 1 TB = 1,000,000,000,000 bytes. Hardware Configurations The platform is available in two configurations, which differ in a variety of aspects, including the performance capacity, footprint, storage size, and scale capabilities:
